text: Anders Bodelsen (11 February 1937 – 17 October 2021) was a Danish writer. His best known novel was Think of a Number (Tænk på et tal, 1968). It was made into a movie known as The Silent Partner in 1978. He also worked on creating children television shows for Danmarks Radio such as Guldregn. Bodelsen died on 17 October 2021 at the age of 84. Forfatter Anders Bodelsen er død ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Danish writers
title: Anders Bodelsen
